source:
TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_SEQ_00Qhoterl Pasol would set history right once and for all.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_SEQ_00Règle spéciale:  synchronisation de quête avec limitation de job ou de classe
* Il n'est possible de progresser dans cette quête qu'avec la classe qui a servi à la commencer.

Qhoterl Pasol veut fabriquer quelque chose.

source: TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_SEQ_01<tab>Deliver the requested supplies to Qhoterl Pasol.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_SEQ_01<tab>Livrer ce qui vous a été demandé à Qhoterl Pasol

source: TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine slabs of splendid black rock at Mjrl's Regret)) ((Deliver the slabs of splendid black rock to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather tufts of splendid hemp at Mjrl's Regret)) ((Deliver the tufts of splendid hemp to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Spearfish a splendid mammoth shellfish in the depths of Lake Tusi Mek'ta)) ((Deliver the splendid mammoth shellfish to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Extraire <var 33 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var> près de la Nostalgie de Mjrl)) ((Livrer <var 33 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> à Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Récolter <var 33 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var> près de la Nostalgie de Mjrl)) ((Livrer <var 33 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> à Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Harponner <var 33 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var> dans le lac Tusi Mek'ta)) ((Livrer <var 33 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> à Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>

source: TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_QHOTERLPASOL_000_000<tab>Thanks to your tireless efforts, our excavation is nearing its completion. The gifts of the past we've uncovered here will be a boon to future Qitari, to be sure, but we mustn't keep our discoveries to ourselves. No, I intend to spread knowledge of Ronka to every corner of the world!
target: TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_QHOTERLPASOL_000_000<tab>Explorateurs avoir fait beaucoup beaucoup de découvertes dans cavernes<var 1D /var>! Monde entier pouvoir en apprendre plus sur secrets d'empire de Ronka<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_QHOTERLPASOL_000_001<tab>To that end, I mean to author a definitive history of Ronka with my own hands. Moreover, I intend to use an ingenious system of woodblocks and ink to produce enough copies so that no curious mind goes unsated.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_QHOTERLPASOL_000_001<tab>Qhoterl Pasol avoir donc décidé de fabriquer livres d'histoire de Ronka pour transmettre Histoire aux générations futuuures<var 1D /var>! Avoir besoin de matériaux, alors <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> aider à rassembler<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_QHOTERLPASOL_000_002<tab>If you would be an ally of history, then I have just the task for you. Pray bring me a slab of black stone from Mjrl's Regret. While it may appear a common stone at first glance, we have long used it to make writing instruments.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_QHOTERLPASOL_000_002<tab>Qhoterl Pasol avoir besoin <var 33 ((Item)) 09F273610202 /var> de haute qualité<var 1D /var>! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> pouvoir extraire près de Nostalgie de Mjrl<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_QHOTERLPASOL_000_003<tab>If you would be an ally of history, then I have just the task for you. Pray bring me hemp from Mjrl's Regret. I can't start writing without paper, and the material made from this hemp is as sturdy as it comes.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_QHOTERLPASOL_000_003<tab>Qhoterl Pasol avoir besoin <var 33 ((Item)) 09F2737B0202 /var> de haute qualité<var 1D /var>! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> pouvoir récolter près de Nostalgie de Mjrl<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_QHOTERLPASOL_000_004<tab>If you would be an ally of history, then I have just the task for you. Pray return with a mammoth shellfish from the depths of Lake Tusi Mek'ta. Though they may be tricky to snag with your spear, their sacs contain enough ink to fill countless inkwells.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_QHOTERLPASOL_000_004<tab>Qhoterl Pasol avoir besoin <var 33 ((Item)) 09F273950202 /var><var 1D /var>! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> pouvoir harponner dans lac Tusi Mek'ta<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_QHOTERLPASOL_000_005<tab>The world is eager to learn the truth of Ronka. Return here with the black stone and I shall begin writing at once!
target: TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_QHOTERLPASOL_000_005<tab>Qhoterl Pasol avoir besoin <var 33 ((Item)) 09F273610202 /var> de haute qualité<var 1D /var>! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> pouvoir extraire près de Nostalgie de Mjrl<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_QHOTERLPASOL_000_006<tab>The world is eager to learn the truth of Ronka. Return here with the hemp and I shall begin writing at once!
target: TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_QHOTERLPASOL_000_006<tab>Qhoterl Pasol avoir besoin <var 33 ((Item)) 09F2737B0202 /var> de haute qualité<var 1D /var>! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> pouvoir récolter près de Nostalgie de Mjrl<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_QHOTERLPASOL_000_007<tab>The world is eager to learn the truth of Ronka. Return here with the shellfish and I shall begin writing at once!
target: TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_QHOTERLPASOL_000_007<tab>Qhoterl Pasol avoir besoin <var 33 ((Item)) 09F273950202 /var><var 1D /var>! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> pouvoir harponner dans lac Tusi Mek'ta<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_SYSTEM_000_008<tab>In order to proceed with this quest, you must first complete the quest “A New Fishing Ex-spear-ience” and unlock spearfishing.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_SYSTEM_000_008<tab>Il est nécessaire de terminer la quête “La pêche au harpon, c'est bon” pour progresser dans celle-ci.

source: TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_QHOTERLPASOL_000_010<tab>I am always glad to see you, and now more than ever! Have you brought the materials I requested?

TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_QHOTERLPASOL_000_011<tab>Splendid, as always! I eventually hope to distribute my chronicle throughout Norvrandt, although it would be prudent to begin with a smaller proving ground, such as the Greatwood. Assuming I meet with success here, my ambitions know no bounds!
target: TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_QHOTERLPASOL_000_011<tab>Magnifique<var 1D /var>! Bientôt, histoire de Ronka ne plus avoir de secrets pour moindre habitant de Norvrandt<var 1D /var>! Gens devenir très cuuultivés et avoir nouveaux sujets de con<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>tion<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_QHOTERLPASOL_000_012<tab>A Steward can ask for no greater honor than this task I've given myself, and I shan't rest until I see it done!
target: TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_QHOTERLPASOL_000_012<tab>Si Qhoterl Pasol pouvoir aussi laisser empreinte dans Histoire grâce à ça, rien ne pouvoir faire plus plaisir, hi hi<var 1D /var>!
TEXT_BANQIQ128_03833_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>Les objets de qualité normale récoltés au cours de cette quête n'ayant aucune utilité et ne pouvant être vendus, il est recommandé de les jeter.
